attributes.action: Call for a government regulator or ombudsman for all new build properties.
attributes.additional_details:
As above.
Give the new build homeowners fair treatment as the home builders and nhbc are leaving home owners with serious problems with their new builds.
attributes.background: An ombudsman or regulator is required to oversee new build complaints which are not being dealt with fairly by home builders or nhbc as they accountable to noone.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555112
